name: Magician Parkhour
description:
Please read this - no instructions are included in the download!

Arrow keys to move, Z to jump, and X to use unlockable spells.

There are 4 spells performed by pressing X while holding a direction with the arrow keys - if you've ever played Smash Bros, it works like that :)

The power escalation got a bit out of hand, so the demo level is really just increasingly big jumps that end up not fitting on the screen. Sorry about that. They're also meant to be pretty difficult so you can't skip unlocks, but if they're too difficult just ask me for a solution (with a screenshot of the room you're struggling with) and I'll send you a solution. If I'm being judged on my ability to make mechanics, I wouldn't want anyone to miss any, obviously :)
